predicate.note: Frames file for 'foretell' based on sentences in ECTB. No VN entry.

roleset.name: make an event known before it happens

example.name: transitive, arg0 and arg1
example.text: Some experts believe that this foretells the transformation of industrial structure of this province from a low level , extensive type to a new high level technology dominance .
example.arg: the transformation of industrial structure of this province from a low level , extensive type to a new high level technology dominance
